item.title: Stumbling into AI: Part 4—Terminology Tidyup (and a little rant)
item.description: Having looked at MCP, Models, and RAG, I realised that I’ve been mentally skirting around something that I don’t really understand, so I’m going to expose myself to some ridicule here and try to understand better: what’s the difference between AI and ML? Aren’t they just the same?
